GQ7ContinuousBIT
public
ContinuousBIT
GQ7ContinuousBIT

Continuous Built-In Test flag data

See the GQ7 Built-in Test documentation for more information

GQ7ContinuousBIT
GQ7ContinuousBIT() = delete
GQ7ContinuousBIT
explicit GQ7ContinuousBIT(
Bytes bytes
)
Parameters
bytes
Bytes

Flag values from Continuous Built-In Test

system
GQ7ContinuousBIT_System system() const

Gets information for system flags (bits 0-31)

Returns
GQ7ContinuousBIT_System

Information for system flags

systemClockFailure
bool systemClockFailure() const override

Gets the value of the System Clock Failure bit (bit 0)

Returns
bool

true: The system clock is not operating properly

powerFault
bool powerFault() const override

Gets the value of the Power Fault bit (bit 1)

Returns
bool

true: Power supply voltage is outside the recommended range, or an internal power fault exists

firmwareFault
bool firmwareFault() const override

Gets the value of the Firmware Fault bit (bit 4)

Returns
bool

true: System firmware has detected an unexpected or abnormal condition

timingOverload
bool timingOverload() const override

Gets the value of the Timing Overload bit (bit 5)

Returns
bool

true: The system is unable to keep up with the processing demand

bufferOverrun
bool bufferOverrun() const override

Gets the value of the Buffer Overrun bit (bit 6)

Returns
bool

true: A data buffer in the system has reached its capacity

imuIpcFault
uint8 imuIpcFault() const

Gets the value of the IMU IPC fault flags (bits 16-19)

Note

Bits 0-3 of this value correspond to bits 16-19

Returns
uint8

Value of the IMU IPC fault flags

imuControlLineFault
bool imuControlLineFault() const

Gets the value of the IMU Control Line Fault bit (bit 16)

Returns
bool

true: The IMU control line is not behaving as expected

imuCommandResponseFault
bool imuCommandResponseFault() const

Gets the value of the IMU Command Response Fault bit (bit 17)

Returns
bool

true: The IMU is not responsive to commands

imuSpiTransferFault
bool imuSpiTransferFault() const

Gets the value of the IMU SPI Transfer Fault bit (bit 18)

Returns
bool

true: Misaligned/failed IMU SPI transfers

imuDataFrameFault
bool imuDataFrameFault() const

Gets the value of the IMU Data Frame Fault bit (bit 19)

Returns
bool

true: Missing IMU data frame(s)

Returns
bool

Returns

bool accelGeneralFault() const override

Gets the value of the Accelerometer General Fault bit (bit 40)

Returns
bool

true: Accelerometer will not initialize

accelOverrange
bool accelOverrange() const override

Gets the value of the Accelerometer Overrange bit (bit 41)

Returns
bool

true: One or more axes subjected to accelerations near or outside the selected range

accelSelfTest
bool accelSelfTestFail() const override

Gets the value of the Accelerometer Self Test bit (bit 42)

Returns
bool

true: The internal self-test of the accelerometer failed

Returns
bool

true: Gyroscope will not initialize

Returns
bool

true: One or more axes subjected to rotational rates near or outside the selected range

Returns
bool

bool

Returns
bool

Returns
bool

true: Pressure sensor won't initialize

bool

bool

bool

true: GNSS antenna 1 is shorted to ground

Returns
bool

bool

bool rtcmCommunicationFault() const

Returns
bool

true: RTCM data was being received previously, but it not currently being received

bool rtkDongleFault() const

Returns
bool

true: A problem has been detected with the RTK dongle. Query directly for more detail
